channel.title: Adobe Labs
channel.description: News and information on Adobe Labs.

item.title: Lightroom Slideshow Gallery Updates
item.description: Earlier today we pushed about a dozen new Slideshow Gallery entries that were contributed by the Lightroom user community. There are some beautiful pictures here and I hope that you agree. If you have a few minutes to spare, take...

item.title: ASDoc Available on Labs
item.description: We have recently released the ASDoc technology on Adobe Labs. ASDoc is a command-line tool that is used to create HTML documentation from AS and MXML files. The HTML output looks similar to the Flex 2 Language Reference. If you...

item.title: Spry Prerelease 1.3 Released on Labs
item.description: This evening on Adobe Labs we released an update to the Spry framework for Ajax that responds to several issues and feature requests reported by users since the initial release of the technology. A detailed change log is available for...

item.title: Lightroom Beta 3 for Windows Released on Labs
item.description: Lightroom beta 3 is now available for the Windows platform on Adobe Labs. The efficient new way for professional photographers to import, manage, and showcase large volumes of digital images now supports Mac and Windows systems. Learn more › Download...

item.title: Spry Framework for Ajax Prerelease 1.2 Released on Labs
item.description: This morning on Adobe Labs we released an update to the Spry framework for Ajax that responds to several issues reported by users since the initial relase of the technology. A detailed change log is available for prerelease 1.2. Learn...

item.title: JamJar Released on Labs
item.description: Tonight we released JamJar on Adobe Labs. JamJar is a demonstration application built with Flex 2 that provides a private and persistent canvas for small groups to easily exchange digital content in order to: * Plan events * Exchange ideas...

item.title: Flash Lite 2.1 for BREW Released on Labs
item.description: Earlier today we released Flash Lite 2.1 for BREW on Adobe Labs. The public beta includes a plug-in for Flash Professional 8 that lets you publish Flash content to the native BREW application format, the Flash Lite extension for testing...

item.title: Cairngorm Released on Labs
item.description: Today on Adobe Labs we released Cairngorm, an open-source microarchitecture (collection of design patterns) for Flex developers that aids in consistently solving recurring design challenges. Learn more in the Labs wiki >...

item.title: Flash Professional 9 ActionScript 3.0 Preview Released on Labs
item.description: To coincide with the release of Flash Player 9 and the underlying ActionScript 3.0 language, we are releasing a preview of the next version of the Flash authoring tool, scheduled for release in 2007. This preview extends the capabilities of...

item.title: Flex 2 Is Now Shipping
item.description: Flex 2 is now available for immediate purchase from Adobe.com. With the new shipping status of Flex 2, the Flex product line (including Flash Player 9 and ColdFusion/Flex Connectivity) has been retired from Adobe Labs. You can download the final,...

item.title: Lightroom Beta 3 Released on Labs
item.description: Tonight on Adobe Labs we released the next version of Lightroom for the Mac. The beta 3 release includes support for several new raw camera foramts, and many new features and enhancements. Review the Release Notes for a complete list...

item.title: Spry Framework for Ajax Prerelease 1.1 Released on Labs
item.description: Earlier today we released an update to the Spry framework for Ajax that responds to several issues reported by users since the initial relase of the technology. A detailed change log is available for prerelease 1.1. Spry Overview Spry Download...

item.title: NoteTag Technology Released on Labs
item.description: Earlier today we released NoteTag on Adobe Labs. This technology is a proof-of-concept for a new project at Adobe currently code-named Kiwi. The Kiwi Project is an exploration of Read/Write RSS and Web 2.0 components for Adobe Flex and the...

item.title: Spry Framework for Ajax Released on Labs
item.description: The Spry framework for Ajax released on Adobe Labs today. The framework is a JavaScript library for web designers that provides functionality that allows designers to build pages that provide a richer experience for their users. It is designed to...

item.title: Flex 2 Beta 3 Released on Labs
item.description: Earlier today Flex 2 beta 3 was released on Labs. Beta 3 includes new versions of Flex Builder 2, Flex Data Services 2, Flex Charting 2, ActionScript 3.0, Flash Player 9 (formerly Flash Player 8.5) and the free Flex SDK....
